data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 36,775 believers living in Bacău, Romania.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bacău, Romania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Bacău.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.section_summary: On average, 50 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Bacău, Romania.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Bacău, Romania. Please, stir the 36,775 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, there are 507,365 people in the state of Bacău who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Azerbaijani people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Azerbaijani people.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 581,000 souls in Bacău and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 36,775 believers in Bacău to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bacău, Romania has a population of 581,000.

We estimate Bacău has 36,775 people who might know Jesus, 507,365 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,860 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 15 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 36,775 believers in Bacău to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
